long_description: Durably built yet lightweight, the REI Sport Beast 22 neatly separates urban attire from the gear you need for your favorite outdoor activities. The lightest rolling luggage made by REI, the Sport Beast line is made from abrasion-resistant Cordura(R) nylon; molded foam on the back provides structure. Bag zips open clamshell-style to reveal two halves, with each half covered by a zip panel; when bag is fully closed, the panels act as a center divider to separate your gear. Rugged telescoping handle and smooth-rolling wheels make the bag easy to maneuver; cushioned grab handle makes it comfortable to lift. "Add-a-bag" hook near the top handle makes it easy to attach ride-along baggage and wheel your way through a crowded airport. Kickstand under the front of the luggage lets you park it upright. An interior zippered mesh pocket and 2 exterior zippered pockets provide organization. Exterior zippers are lock compatible (locks sold separately). The REI Sport Beast 22 includes a discreet ID window accessible via an inner zip pocket. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: Durably built yet lightweight, the REI Sport Beast 22 neatly separates urban attire from the gear you need for your favorite outdoor activities.
